title: American_Top_40_1975_June_21st
description:
American Top 40 with Casey Kasem aired on radio from July 4, 1970 until August 6, 1988. This rebroadcast is one of many I have recorded from internet radio. Some are incomplete but most are not and I hope you enjoy these as much as I do.

In this broadcast:

Casey answers the questions:

Has any group had a hit in the top 40 while one of its members has had a hit in the top 40?

What was the only song to hit number one on the Pop chart, the Soul chart, and the Country chart at the same time?

Which family group has had the most top 40 hits?

If Elvis is the king of the charts, who is the queen?
